website_summaries.verdict: The JBL Reflect Mini headphones deliver more accurate frequency response than most bass-heavy gym-focused options.
pros: Powerful audio performance with well-defined bass and crisp highs
Extra-secure fit and sweat-resistant design ideal for exercise
cons: Not for those seeking mega-bass sound

customer_reviews.title: My second pair of these headphones. The last pair ...
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of these headphones. The last pair lasted me 3 years. I used them every day while biking, running, or weight lifting. They stay in my ears even during the sweetest conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Hillman

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Designed with Women in Mind
customer_reviews.text: Reflect Mini in Ear ... fits my small ears perfectly. I use this headphone every day and don't use anything else. It's good to have multiple sets.
customer_reviews.author: StitchesWithPets

customer_reviews.title: They were good until they weren't!
customer_reviews.text: They were good until they weren't! These were decent headphones until one day I removed them from my phone and the wire separated from the connector. I pulled the connector housing and the 1/8 male connector stayed in the phone. I was just lucky that I was at home and had tools to remove from my phone. Maybe it was just defective. Too bad since these were a very good value before they broke.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the Source; headphones OK
customer_reviews.text: These came on time; good protective packaging, etc.. Will order from them again definitely! The JBL headphones just don't fit quite right in either my or my son's ears.. They're good, but can't lodge them in well enough to get the full effect and block out external noise entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I run with it 5 times a week. Its sounds good, fit well and overall very recomanded. You can hear the bouns and the cadal rubbin your body but after few kilometer toy get use to it. The fit is good but not great. Good. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Dotan Barzilay

customer_reviews.title: love these, but the ear pieces come off eventually and the replacements won't stay on well
customer_reviews.text: I love these but I am on my 3rd pair because the ear pieces come off. I have bought replacements, but they never stick on as well as the originals.
customer_reviews.author: Woodland Wildflower

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for running, good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Really good fit, it doesn't fall. In fact it fits so well that depending on where you run ( too many cars ) you need to be careful because you might not hear the sound of them coming.
customer_reviews.author: Fabiano Galastri

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for good price
customer_reviews.text: Wear them everyday at work and while I’m out and about. Great sound quality. Very comfortable to wear for long periods of time. Easy to wrap up and don’t tangle easily. Overall, everything I expect in a good pair of ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Johnpoll

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: The right earbud is now quieter for no reason after 3 months of use
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: For the money, I don't think you'll find better sound or comfort. My last pair lasted for about 3 years, and these are performing well also.
customer_reviews.author: M1Gunner

customer_reviews.title: ... sound quality is decent and they ear buds fit comfortably but the connection creates a lot of static whenever ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is decent and they ear buds fit comfortably but the connection creates a lot of static whenever it is moved. The purpose of this was for when working out which the Ipod would be constantly moving and there was constant static.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had JBL’s before and have loved them. Love this one
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Ear Buds give Great Sound and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these earbuds. Made a great Xmas gift for him.
customer_reviews.author: Jetty Girl

customer_reviews.title: I love these earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I love these earbuds. They fit great and I no longer have the problem of the buds falling out of my ears during exercise or general movement (which would happen w all other earbuds).
customer_reviews.author: Amy J Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Tried the previous model and it wasn't compatible with my phone. These on the other hand work great, sound great, they don't fall when I'm biking, they have no annoying extension and they look cool, too. The only downside is they really isolate sound so you might be extra careful if you're exercising on the streets.
customer_reviews.author: cefros

customer_reviews.title: NOT SWEAT-PROOF as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones, as they claim to be sweat proof. I'd tried several other manufacturers headphones/earbuds and sweat in the voice control caused the volume on my phone to automatically turn down. In frustration I shelled out the money for these JBL's. Today was roughly the twentieth use and these headphones do the same thing. NOT SWEAT PROOF AS ADVERTISED. Also not worth the money. I have a Google Nexus phone and confirmed through Google that is indeed the actual headphones malfunctioning, not the phone or headset jack. What a disappointing experience for m such a trusted manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these works great for workout, and sound quality is pretty good
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAholic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent love it, battery last 8 hours or more, extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gaston Galguera

customer_reviews.title: These are wireless.
customer_reviews.text: Were advertised as wired but received the Bluetooth wireless ones (which worked out okay because the gift recipient liked them). He said they work great, fit comfortably in his ear without falling out.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ashpaugh

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded all expectations. Very comfortable, stay in my ears and great sound quality. Used to have Beats buds and they were uncomfortable and sounded terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan F.

customer_reviews.title: Buds fit in small ears
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a couple of weeks. I have really small ears and was pleasantly surprised that the small buds fit.
customer_reviews.author: Femme de Loi

customer_reviews.title: Nice earphones
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about how I'd like how these would fit in my ears. But after getting them I really like them. They come with multiple ends so I just found the ones that were most comfortable. The stay in while working out and they sound great. Better than two sets of Sony's, a Phillips and a Bose set we have.
customer_reviews.author: M Smetana

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: These are good ear buds for exercise. The stay in my ears, and the sound quality is fine. The biggest attribute is that the magnets in the earbuds click together and the flat cord keep it from tangling.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Kozicki

customer_reviews.title: Easily the best headphones for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For <$30, these sound and fit great. I use them for the gym only. They withstand my tough, sweaty HIIT workouts. I tired many ear buds - cheap to expensive, wired and unwired. These just can’t be beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Lyte786

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a product worth its money. It does have some limitations, but then again, every product will have pros and cons. Happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: mourya

customer_reviews.title: Really lacks bass
customer_reviews.text: The earpiece is a nice feature and lets me wear these while cycling without having them fall out... although I don't really have that problem with run-of-the-mill ear buds anyway. While over-done bass plagues most audio products I've seen this one suffers from having almost no bass whatsoever. Update: After using these for nearly a year, they've become my main earbuds. Even without much bass, they sound great.
customer_reviews.author: Hydraxan14

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite for running! I go 8+ miles without ever having to readjust. Would definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Deia

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed product
customer_reviews.text: Since JBL is s decent brand I thought these would be good. I am very disappointed. I had a set of Bose earbuds before these that were great (but I couldn't find that model anymore). I decided to give these a try. The removable earpiece is too removable...it was always popping out of the main part. And when the cord was touched or rubbed, that sound would transmit to the speakers...very annoying. After dealing with this inferior product for almost a year, they're going in the trash now.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality , simple and good price.!
customer_reviews.text: Had a wireless reflect which sound quality is the same. However, charging headphone is a hassle since there is no charge meter specially on my long biking ride.end up losing headphone while recharging at my break room work.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Sullera

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: better than the $1 cheap earphones & the $20 generic headphones. Obviously no bose, but impressive sound & worth $10. The wires never tangle. Also don't damage easily.
customer_reviews.author: uzma110

customer_reviews.title: Breaking apart after only 1,5 year of use. Poor quality device.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very nice (better than those ipod/iphone earpods, at least), but this device is disposable. After 1,5 year using it for regular indoor sports practice (which is its purpose, since the cover of its package shows a guy who's supposed to be an athlete using it) it is starting to fall into pieces. Poor quality device.
customer_reviews.author: Claudio Torres Fh

customer_reviews.title: I found that they fall out easily but i have mostly been able to find them
customer_reviews.text: Can you buy replacement budtips? I found that they fall out easily but i have mostly been able to find them. Except for today, one if them is lost for good. And I'm devastated because these are the only ones that stay in when I run
customer_reviews.author: pealawson

product_meta.title: JBL Reflect Mini In-Ear Headphones 3.5mm Stereo Wired Sweatproof Earbud with 1 Button Remote and Mic
product_meta.description: Sweat proof and sporting a unique reflective design, the lightweight JBL Reflect Mini in-ear sport headphones were designed to stay put even during the most intense workouts. Legendary JBL sound can be comfortably enjoyed through the premium 5.8mm dynamic drivers while actively participating in everything from running to cross-fit for hours on end. Offering the smallest sport design from JBL, the JBL Reflect Mini may make you forget you are wearing headphones at all. Featuring a one button remote and mic, adjustable Y-Split cables and the angled connector, the JBL Reflect Mini is the perfect training partner. In The Box:1 pair of JBL Reflect Mini in-ear sport headphones, 1 button in-line control with microphone, 2 sizes of ergonomic sport ear-tips, 2 sizes of regular ear-tips, 1 Quick Start Guide, 1 Safety Sheet. Please note that these headphones are not Bluetooth enabled.
feature_bullets: Lightweight design - As the lightest JBL in-ear sport headphones, the Mini provides long lasting comfort during a variety of athletic activities.
Premium 5.8mm dynamic drivers - Delivers the legendary JBL sound that was created by some of the finest sound engineers in the world.
Highly Reflective Cable - Designed for ultimate visibility at night.
Wired headphones provide crisp clean sound without interference.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
